item.title: [Python] Stress Test with Locust written in Python
item.description: This article will be the second day of [Brainpad Advent Calender 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/brainpad) Hello @ is nissy0409240 I’m an engineer at BrainPad 2019 was less than a month away How is everyone doing This year I was able to go to Tokyo Dome privately It was a moving year Speaking of Tokyo Dome, baseball Speaking of baseball, itâ€™s a pitcher and a batter. Regardless of such preface, in this entry We will introduce the basic functions of Locust, a load test tool that can write scenarios in Python.
